events.message: I received the wrong item in my recent order and would like to request a refund as soon as possible.
The reported issue was classified under the Refund category since the customer wants money back for the wrong product.
This case has been assigned to agent Lisa M., who specializes in refund requests and order issues.
Hello! Thanks for reaching out. I’m here to help you with your refund request for the incorrect item you received.
Could you please provide your order number and a photo of the item you received so we can verify the issue?
Sure, the order number is 987654321. I attached a photo of the item that clearly shows it’s not what I ordered.
Thank you for the details and photo. I’ve processed a full refund for your order, and you should see the amount back in your account within 3-5 business days.
Great, thanks for handling this quickly! I appreciate the refund and your help resolving the problem.
I’m glad we could resolve this promptly. If you need anything else, feel free to reach out anytime.
Just checking in to ensure your refund was received and that everything is now satisfactory with your order experience.
Since the refund was confirmed received and no further issues were raised, this case will now be closed. Thank you for your patience.
